Established more than 50 years ago in a beautifully landscaped valley setting and still family-run. Wayside Water Gardens are specialists in Koi Carp ponds and natural ponds which include Rigid and flexible lined Ponds, Pumps, Filters and Pond Lighting as well as an enviable selection of award-winning Water Lilies and Aquatic Pond Plants. All varieties of outdoor coldwater fish including Koi Carp from 4"-24" are available plus a super selection of indoor coldwater fancy fish. Our professional and friendly staff are trained to give you the best advice and will help you to find the correct equipment for your needs. Wayside Water Gardens offer everything you would need to create a modest water feature to the largest lake and supplying to the general public as well as local authorities, hospitals, schools, public houses and hotels, ideally placed and within easy reach of Sheffield, Rotherham, Worksop and Doncaster. Our grounds house 2 natural ponds, a formal raised stone pond and we have a stunning timber koi pond on display for your inspiration. - We are even selling kits for you to create your own timber pond if you're inspired by the look of ours. Our staff are all experienced in the setting up of ponds, water features and aquariums and will be able to guide you every step of the way. We're also experts in fish health and offer water testing for all ponds and tanks, as well as fish scapes so we can best advise you if your fish aren't doing as well as usual. What's more, all fish sold at Wayside Water Gardens are sold with a 7-day health guarantee and our staff are all able to advise you on the suitability of fish for your pond or aquarium. If you need any help with a pond, aquarium or water feature, talk to us now - we'd love to hear from you. New Jackets & Vests Knit Tops Dresses Sweaters Pants Shirts & Blouses Halloween Inspired by Nature. Designed for You. The Heart of Our Heritage Inspired by the scenic beauty of the Inland Northwest, Coldwater Creek was founded 
in Sandpoint, Idaho, in 1984. With nature as our muse, we find an endless bounty of
ideas, creating a brand aesthetic that’s unmistakably Coldwater. Delightful by Design We evoke elemental textures, tones, 
patterns and details to bring our looks
to life. Our styles are rich with unexpected
touches that embrace artistry, wonder 
and the beauty of nature. Quality You Can Feel Our customers often comment on how great 
our clothes make them feel. Quality fabrics,
outstanding construction and livable designs 
are the heart of this experience. We pay 
deep attention to fit and function, with the
goal of creating everyday comfort. Style All Your Own Our collections invite leisurely exploration 
and serendipitous discoveries. We aim to 
surprise and delight you with an organic 
shopping experience, where you follow 
your own path to find looks that let you 
express yourself… naturally. I love Coldwater for its well-made designs of high-quality materials, many 
with an unexpected fashion twist. They are classics that never go out of 
style, with that certain something extra that elevates them to favorites. Coldwater Creek Customer Close × !
